outputs.output_descr: This project aims to provide an influential and widespread English-daily newspaper to English-speaking Syrians and foreigners seeking Syrian news. While the project intends to fulfill its objectives within national media institutional development goals expressed in the Syrian Government's 10th Five Year Plan, UNDAF and CPAP, it will produce a model for future media development projects in Syria.  This project will be executed by the Syrian Government in collaboration with UNDP.
outputs.output_title: OPERATION OF SYRIA TIMES IN SY

project_descr: SUPPORT TO THE SYRIA TIMES NEWSPAPER
project_title: SUPPORT TO THE SYRIA TIMES NEWSPAPER
